Comment.value:
Update Journal Entry for Juror 2 (Jevon):

I have spoken with Jevon, one of the jurors in Rolgan's case.  He seems sympathetic to Rolgan's case - I get the feeling he's been arrested for drunken brawling a few times himself.  If I play up the influence of alcohol it might help sway Jevon to my side.
Player has trial notebook and trial plot not over and int not low
Make sure PC has enough gold
make sure PC has enough gold
